text:
Told us 40 minutes for a pickup order and when we got there, told us it was another 30. It was fun telling a house full of people that there was no dinner coming after waiting an hour. 

Poor performance by a new restaurant, definitely lost me as a customer for good. 1 star is more than they deserve.
Good quality sushi & sashimi for a small takeout place. Blow torch fish at pretty good price!

Quick and decent prices. I also love that they are light on the rice for their rolls - so you don't just feel like you're eating rice! I live down the road from this place and have ordered twice from them so far but both times been really happy with the food.
